title: Civil Rights in the Transgender Age
description:
President Trump recently confirmed a New York Times report that his administration was debating whether to strictly redefine gender. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg diversity reporter Jordyn Holman about the the potential fallout from the hotly contested debate. 
FOLLOW UP
 Jordyn's latest report: Netflix Denies Tailoring Its Movie Promotions Based on Race
You can follow Jordyn at: @JordynJournals 
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
itunes:author: Bloomberg
itunes:subtitle: with Jordyn Holman (Bloomberg News)
